reviews.review_msg: While lectures aren't mandatory they are almost necessary to assure your success in this course. Kanna is a knowledgeable and highly educated professor but VERY dry. It's hard to pay attention and follow along in lecture. That being said: attend every lecture and do the practice hw questions and you'll be golden.
Brace yourself for public humiliation when you present your group project. Kanna will grill your group in front of the whole class if you can't answer her questions.

Prof Kanna is so understanding and accommodating. I think it's the first time they're reaching HSCI341. It has been kinda tough but Prof Kanna has taken feedback from students and changed the course structure to better help the students and make sure we're not overburdened. The material
